original_title: Let's Fall in Love: A Singles Weekend at the Concord Hotel
overview: Before there was Tinder and on-line dating, thousands of singles flocked to the Concord Hotelâ€™s famed weekends. Situated in the Catskill Mountains, these unattached people mixed and mingled in a high-pressure atmosphere eagerly looking for love.
title: Let's Fall in Love: A Singles Weekend at the Concord Hotel
